get.description: Returns a hello world message

post.description: Reloads API permissions from the database into the in-memory cache. This endpoint allows hot-reloading of permission rules without restarting the server.
Submits a keyword extraction task to the AI worker queue and returns a task ID for tracking
Submits a JSON normalization task to the AI worker queue and returns a task ID for tracking. This normalizes unstructured text into a structured JSON format based on the provided schema.
Submits a text summarization task to the AI worker queue and returns a task ID for tracking

get.description: Retrieves the status and result of a previously submitted AI task. Returns task status (PENDING, STARTED, SUCCESS, FAILURE) and the result if available.

delete.description: Deletes the result of a completed task from the queue system. This is useful for cleanup after retrieving results.

post.description: Authenticates a user with login_id/email and password. Returns access token in response body and refresh token as HTTP-only cookie.
Revokes the current refresh token and clears the cookie.
Revokes all refresh tokens for the current user, logging them out from all devices.

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's information and roles.

post.description: Uses the refresh token from HTTP-only cookie to generate new access and refresh tokens. Implements token rotation for security.
Creates a new user account with email, password, and name. The user is automatically added to the 'public' group.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of common codes ordered by category and sort_order

post.description: Creates a new common code. Category, code, and name are required. Category + code must be unique.

409.description: Category and code combination already exists

put.description: Updates multiple common codes in a single transaction

post.description: Creates multiple common codes in a single transaction

delete.description: Deletes multiple common codes in a single transaction

get.description: Retrieves all unique categories from common codes
Retrieves all common codes in a specific category, ordered by sort_order

put.description: Updates the sort_order of multiple codes in a category

post.description: Searches for common codes based on category, code, name, or description

get.description: Retrieves a common code by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing common code. Category + code must be unique.

409.description: Category and code combination already exists

delete.description: Deletes a common code by ID

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of departments

post.description: Creates a new department with JSONB name and description

put.description: Updates multiple departments in a single transaction

post.description: Creates multiple departments in a single transaction

delete.description: Soft-deletes multiple departments in a single transaction

post.description: Searches for departments based on name or description

get.description: Retrieves the full department tree structure
Retrieves a department by its public ID

delete.description: Soft-deletes a department by public ID

get.description: Retrieves direct children of a department

put.description: Moves a department to a new parent

get.description: Retrieves a subtree starting from a specific department
Retrieves detailed entry information including tags and references

delete.description: Performs a soft delete on an entry

post.description: Adds tags to an entry

delete.description: Removes a tag from an entry

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of files uploaded by the current user

post.description: Uploads a file to the default storage backend. Maximum file size is 100MB.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a file without downloading it

delete.description: Performs a soft delete on a file. Only the file uploader can delete the file.

get.description: Downloads the file content. Increments the download counter.

put.description: Updates the metadata of a file. Only the file uploader can update metadata.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of groups

post.description: Creates a new group with JSONB name and description

put.description: Updates multiple groups in a single transaction

post.description: Creates multiple groups in a single transaction

delete.description: Deletes multiple groups in a single transaction

post.description: Searches for groups based on name or description

get.description: Retrieves a group by its public ID

delete.description: Deletes a group by public ID

get.description: Retrieves all roles assigned to a group

put.description: Assigns roles to a group (replaces existing roles)

delete.description: Removes a role from a group

get.description: Retrieves all users in a group

put.description: Assigns users to a group (replaces existing users)

delete.description: Removes a user from a group

get.description: Returns the health status of the service and database connection
Retrieves the binary content of an email attachment
Retrieve full details of a specific email including body content and conversation thread. Requires authentication.

parameters.description: Email address of the mailbox to access
parameters.name: mailbox

get.description: Retrieve a list of emails from a specified Exchange mailbox and folder. Requires authentication.

parameters.description: Email address of the mailbox to access
parameters.name: mailbox

get.description: Check if the Exchange Web Services connection is properly configured and accessible
Retrieves a paginated list of roles

post.description: Creates a new role with unique name

put.description: Updates multiple roles in a single transaction

post.description: Creates multiple roles in a single transaction

delete.description: Deletes multiple roles in a single transaction

post.description: Searches for roles based on name or description

get.description: Retrieves a role by its ID
Retrieves all user IDs that have a specific role
Retrieves a paginated list of tags

post.description: Creates a new tag

get.description: Retrieves a tag by its ID

delete.description: Performs a soft delete on a tag

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tickets with simplified response

post.description: Creates a new ticket with an initial entry. Title and initial_entry are required.
Searches for tickets based on various criteria

get.description: Retrieves detailed ticket information including entries and tags

delete.description: Deletes a ticket and all its entries

post.description: Creates a new entry for a ticket
Adds tags to a ticket

delete.description: Removes a tag from a ticket

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users with simplified response

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided data. Email and name are required. If login_id is not provided, email is used as login_id.
Searches for users based on various criteria (name, email, mobile number, office number)

get.description: Retrieves detailed user information by their public ID

put.description: Updates an existing user with the provided data

delete.description: Performs a soft delete on a user (sets is_deleted flag to true)

get.description: Retrieves all groups a user belongs to
Retrieves all roles assigned to a user

put.description: Assigns roles to a user (replaces existing roles)

delete.description: Removes a specific role from a user

message.example: EWS client is configured and ready

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
